import CustomSlider from './CustomSlider?dev-site-example';

# Custom Slider

### Description

This example demonstrates a [Slider](/components/cerner-terra-framework-docs/slider/about) with a custom field label and minimum and maximum labels. This example uses 'minimumLabel' and 'maximumLabel' props to set custom labels. These labels are also used to construct the visually hidden text used to assist screen reader users. 

<CustomSlider />
